# Metrics

This document enumerates the metrics collected by this project using the [Glean SDK](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/index.html).
This project may depend on other projects which also collect metrics.
This means you might have to go searching through the dependency tree to get a full picture of everything collected by this project.

# Pings

- [interaction](#interaction)
- [page-view](#page-view)

## interaction

A custom ping which is sent when a page element
is interacted with.


This ping includes the [client id](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section).

**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://github.com/mozilla/bedrock/issues/10746>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| element.label |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |Text label of the page element that was clicked e.g. 'Download Firefox', 'Get Mozilla VPN'.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| element.position |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The page position of the link that was clicked e.g. 'primary', 'secondary', 'navigation', 'footer'.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| element.type |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The type of the page element that was clicked e.g. 'link', 'button'.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.id |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The ID of the page that was viewed.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.locale |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The locale of the page that was viewed.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.referrer |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The referring URL that linked to this page.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.url |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The full page URL including locale, path and query parameters.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.viewed |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time a page was viewed.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |

## page-view

A ping which is sent everytime a page is viewed.


This ping includes the [client id](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section).

**Data reviews for this ping:**

- <https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0>

**Bugs related to this ping:**

- <https://github.com/mozilla/bedrock/issues/10746>

All Glean pings contain built-in metrics in the [`ping_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-ping_info-section) and [`client_info`](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/index.html#the-client_info-section) sections.

In addition to those built-in metrics, the following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration | [Data Sensitivity](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| page.id |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The ID of the page that was viewed.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.locale |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The locale of the page that was viewed.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.referrer |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The referring URL that linked to this page.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.url |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The full page URL including locale, path and query parameters.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |
| page.viewed |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The time a page was viewed.  |[Bug TODO](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=TODO#c0)||never |3 |

Data categories are [defined here](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Firefox/Data_Collection).
